content: garter stitch beanie abou t this pattern this hat is knitted sideways in garter stitch using short row this is an adult size hat and will easily fit teens it can be adjusted to child sizes by casting on less stitches and making shorter short row preparation size adult recommended yarn any worsted weight yarn needles 4 5mm abbreviations k -knit w&t - wrap and turn bobble - bind off instructions finishing cut yarn leaving a long tail of about 15-20 use cast on 46 r1 k45 w&t the long tail to seam bind off edges together r2 k45 close the hole at the top of the hat weave in r3 k44 w&t ends r4 k44 r5 k43 w&t r6 k43 pattern notes r7 k42 w&t if using a heavier worsted weight yarn you may r8 k42 need to only repeat row 1-21 5 more times or r9 k41 w&t until you reach your desired size r10 k41 r11 k40 w&t r12 k40 r13 k39 w&t r14 k39 r15 k38 w&t r16 k38 r17 k37 w&t r18 k37 r19 k36 w&t r20 46 pick up and resolve stitches r21 k46 r22-125 repeat row 1-21 7 more times r126 bind off all stiches knit-wise send pattern corrections to emily182g@gmail com ~ raverly ebeli ~ instagram ebeliknits
